text: The South Korea women's national under-18 and under-19 basketball team is a national basketball team of South Korea and is governed by the Korea Basketball Association.http://www.fiba.com/pages/eng/fc/FIBA/fibaStru/nfLeag/p/nationalfederationnumber/313/nfProf.html It represents the country in international under-19 and under-18 (under age 19 and under age 18) women's basketball competitions. ==See also== *South Korea women's national basketball team *South Korea women's national under-17 basketball team *South Korea men's national under-19 basketball team ==References== Category:Basketball in South Korea Category:Basketball teams in South Korea Category:Women's national under-19 basketball teams W
title: South Korea women's national under-19 basketball team
